decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Shatter the Sky and Agent of Treachery. It utilizes card advantage and manipulation with Narset, Parter of Veils and Omen of the Sea, while generating value with Teferi, Time Raveler and Elspeth Conquers Death. The deck also includes a companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, to provide additional value and flexibility. Overall, the strategy revolves around controlling the game, generating advantage, and overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats.

The main focus of this deck is to establish early board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Dreadhorde Butcher and Serrated Scorpion. It also utilizes sacrifice synergies with Priest of Forgotten Gods, Cauldron Familiar, and Witch's Oven to gain advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The addition of cards like Call of the Death-Dweller, Act of Treason, and Claim the Firstborn allows for additional threats to be brought back from the graveyard or stolen from the opponent. The deck aims to control the board while dealing consistent damage to the opponent.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free. It aims to slow down the opponent's strategy with board wipes like Shatter the Sky and steal their key cards with Agent of Treachery. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation to ensure consistency in drawing into powerful cards. The goal is to outvalue the opponent and ultimately overwhelm them with a wide range of threats and answers.

The deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of removal spells like Shatter the Sky and Glass Casket, while also utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to ramp up into big threats like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery using Fires of Invention to cheat out expensive spells. Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value by flickering permanents for more card advantage. The deck's main goal is to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent with its strong control game plan and powerful late-game threats.

This deck aims to control the game by utilizing Fires of Invention to play multiple spells for free each turn. It focuses on board control with cards like Agent of Treachery and Shatter the Sky, while generating value with cards like Omen of the Sun and Elspeth Conquers Death. The deck also includes card draw engines like Omen of the Sea and Narset, Parter of Veils, and win conditions like Shark Typhoon and Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast. The companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, provides additional value by flickering permanents for extra value.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice mechanics and aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By constantly sacrificing creatures like Serrated Scorpion and Cauldron Familiar with Priest of Forgotten Gods and Witch's Oven, the deck gains incremental advantages while disrupting the opponent's game plan. With powerful threats like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Knight of the Ebon Legion, the deck aims to pressure the opponent quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for recurring key pieces from the graveyard, providing consistent value throughout the game.

Utilize card advantage and mana ramp to control the board and outvalue opponents. Use Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Wilderness Reclamation to generate massive amounts of mana and card draw. Counter opponent's spells with Mystical Dispute and tempo swings with Brazen Borrower. Finish off opponents with Shark Typhoon and Expansion / Explosion. Use Scorching Dragonfire and Storm's Wrath as removal options. The deck aims to control the game until it can overwhelm opponents with powerful late-game threats and card advantage. It focuses on strong mana fixing with a mix of lands and strong card synergies.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage while ramping mana with Growth Spiral and Wilderness Reclamation. With the ability to generate large amounts of mana, the deck aims to finish the game with powerful spells like Expansion / Explosion and Shark Typhoon. The deck utilizes a mix of threats and answers to maintain board control and outvalue the opponent over time. The key strategy revolves around tempo control and card advantage to ultimately overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells.

This deck focuses on using the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with removal and card draw. The goal is to gain advantage through card advantage and tempo plays, using cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Sphinx of Foresight to outmaneuver opponents. The win condition typically revolves around either overwhelming the opponent with large creatures like Cavalier of Flame or creating a massive Shark Typhoon token, while also having the option to utilize Chance for Glory for a surprise victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, controlling the board with cards like Shatter the Sky and Agent of Treachery. The deck also includes a variety of card draw and utility spells, along with planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils for added control. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion for additional value and flexibility. The deck aims to outvalue and outcontrol opponents by generating card advantage and leveraging the power of Fires of Invention to dominate the late game.

This deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast multiple spells for free each turn, allowing for strong control over the game. By combining cards like Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast and Teferi, Time Raveler with powerful cards like Shark Typhoon and Elspeth Conquers Death, the deck can quickly take control of the board and outvalue opponents. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value through flickering permanents. Ultimately, the deck aims to slow down the game and grind out advantages until it can overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils, along with board wipes like Shatter the Sky and Elspeth Conquers Death. The strategy revolves around utilizing Fires of Invention to cast spells for free and generate value from cards like Yorion, Sky Nomad. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast is used to cheat powerful creatures into play, and the deck also includes a variety of threats like Dream Trawler and Drakuseth, Maw of Flames to close out the game.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using knights and other low-cost creatures. By utilizing cards that support knight synergies and combat tricks, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while controlling the board. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value and resilience to the deck's game plan. The mana base is designed to support the Mardu color combination and ensure consistent access to the necessary colors for casting spells.

This deck focuses on leveraging the odd converted mana costs of its creatures and spells to take advantage of the powerful companion, Obosh, the Preypiercer. By maximizing the damage output of each individual creature and utilizing sacrifice effects like Woe Strider and Witch's Oven, the deck aims to pressure the opponent aggressively and finish them off quickly. With a mix of creatures that can come back from the graveyard and reach damage directly to the opponent, this Rakdos Aggro deck is looking to overwhelm and outpace the opponent in a fast-paced match.

The deck focuses on using creatures with aggressive abilities and low mana costs to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing the companion Obosh, the Preypiercer, all odd converted mana cost cards in the deck deal extra damage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a continuous stream of creatures and burn spells, maximizing the damage output each turn to finish the game quickly. The deck's synergy comes from using efficient creatures and burn spells to control the board and put pressure on the opponent to win the game.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying a wide variety of creatures to overwhelm the opponent and leveraging Winota, Joiner of Forces to cheat out powerful creatures like Agent of Treachery and Haktos the Unscarred. By using cards like Raise the Alarm and Legion Warboss to generate tokens, as well as Chandra, Acolyte of Flame to recur spells, the deck aims to rapidly build a board presence and pressure the opponent into submission. The inclusion of cards like Brazen Borrower and Bonecrusher Giant provides additional utility and disruption to maintain board control.
